snippet.title: R.U.S.E. - Launch Trailer [Europe]
snippet.description:
More videos on http://www.rusegame.com.
Gameplay trailer for the best real-time strategy game of the year. R.U.S.E. lets you take control of six factions in intense Single-player and multiplayer battles. Use cunning, strategy and a vast arrays of ruses to defeat your opponents, but beware to avoid their own traps!
Don't believe what you see.
